Date: 2024-10-08 22:52
Subject: Major Incident Resolved : Intermittent SIOCS Login Issue
--------------------------------------------------


 


Major Incident Resolved : Intermittent SIOCS Login Issue

______________________________________________________________________________

Date: 08 October 2024

Time: 8:57 PM GST

 

Dear Colleagues,

 

Please be informed that SIOCS connectivity has been restored. Both handheld devices and desktop applications are accessible now. The tech teams have reprocessed any failed transactions during this outage.

 

If you require any assistance during this timeframe, we kindly request you to raise a support ticket by visiting the following link: https://onereach.chalhoub.com <https://eur03.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fonereach.chalhoub.com%2F&data=05%7C02%7CHagop.Ghazarian%40chalhoub.com%7Cc120fa6537f746158e3d08dce7ca3aba%7C6ef8304cf37b42a5a5690a7d8249fbf3%7C0%7C0%7C638640103665370932%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ptWR5WWJAR0XN3MATK4N0d7o%2FJDWqXnQ2vzaVGaSWS4%3D&reserved=0> .

 

Alternatively, you can also reach out to us via WhatsApp at +971 48045755 or utilize the chatbot available on the support portal. 

 

Chalhoub Tech.
